text:
â€ŒI believe in no god...except our very own mechgawd
â€ŒMujhe apne nam se kafi abhar feel hota kyuki usi kaaran mera roll no. tumhare aas-pas aya or 2nd 3rd year ki almost sari labs me hum sathi bne 
â€ŒKyuki bhai sath hota th to lab ki tension adhi or fun double ho jata tha
â€ŒU always remained a very reliable and trustworthy friend...and I know u will achieve great things ahead
â€ŒAll the best for future brother
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Yo Akash, 
â€ŒI may be the few ones jisne tumhe kbhi is nam se bhi bulaya hoga.. 
â€ŒEntering in iitk in 1st year and being overwhelmed with so many opportunities... bhai thoda insecure feel krke bolta th ki 'itna kuch hai krne ko apn kuch kr payenge ya nhi'...and after 4 years bhai ne itna kuch kr dala ki pura campus insecure ho jata
â€ŒBut yar wo treasure-hunt wali raat to kbhi bhula hi nhi skte...mai to tezi me bhag aya th pehle phir bakiyo ne bola to realise kiya mai tujhe hall1 me akela bina phone ke chod aya th...kya phati thi yar phir to
â€Œ(although bhai full bravery me sbka saamna krke jald hi waps aa gya th) 
â€ŒBs ab aage bhi apni bakaiti se sb jagah aise hi jhande gadte rehna... khub paisa kmana... aur thoda RR wala element kam kr lena
â€ŒAll the best for future brother
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Thakur bhanu pratap ko nacheez ka salaam...bhai wo galaxy me outcome ke alawa baki sb cheezo me kuch jyada hi maje kr liye
â€ŒWo ek din me kuch kuch bnake bs muh uthake sos ke event me jane ka bhi alg hi fun tha 
â€ŒBaki abhi to apn ek hi upsc ki kashti me sawar hai...or tumhara to jabalpur se bhi rishta jud chuka hai...to mulakaat to hoti nhi rhegi
â€Œaur agr LBSNAA me mauka mila to wo galaxy wala scene zrur recreate krenge
â€ŒAll the best for future brother
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
'yo beta yo...zyada na socho...aur iski mat suno'...1st year me is level ka adbhut scene bnane wali sathi ho hamara pranaam
â€ŒPhir summer workshop me bich ke 15 min ke break me hall4 ho ke ane ka bhi alg hi mza tha
â€ŒBdhiya tym tha yar wo...simple and fun...phir pta hi nhi chla kab cheeze complicated ho gyi (mujhe to shi me nhi pta ðŸ˜…) 
â€ŒBaki waisa hi fun krne ka mauka aage bhi kbhi n kbhi mil hi jayega...aur tab to shyd tumhare abstract-algebra me ek do research-paper bhi aa chuke honge (yahi field btayi thi n 1st year me shyd..)
All the best for future
â€ŒP.S. aap hi bahu dhud do na mummyji ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Yo KT bro.. 
â€ŒMy impression for u in 1st year was.. 'yar ye thoda swaggy sa chill sa bnda hai'
â€ŒBut I was so so wrong... as you turned out to be the guy with most passion, emotion, aggression filled in him...mujhe aaj bhi yad hai jab orientation'20 me kuch 'unforeseen circumstances' aa gye the to sbka pehla reaction tha ki achcha h Rishabh nhi hai wrna usko zyada BT ho jati 
â€ŒBut tumhare usi passion ne 3rd year me aisa jalwa dikhaya...ki sab mantramugdh ho gye or antaragni se lekr inter-iit tak fursat-mandli ka parcham sbse upr lehraya
â€ŒI know u feel ki tu thoda zyada direct hoke jo dil me ata wo seedha bol deta hai...but trust me it is a very rare and special quality...never feel bad about it
â€ŒTune ostwal ke room pe bola th ki 'hum panch' ko char mt hone dena...wo baat mai kbhi bhul nhi paya... aur thoda stable hone ke bad bahut regret hua us bat ko na rkh pane ka yar...really sorry for it  (ek bar hosh me rehke bolna bhi zruri tha ig ðŸ˜…) 
â€ŒBs ab aage ke jeevan me try krna ki BT se bahut dur reh ke hmesha positivity se bharpur rho...aur jaise yaha chaapa waise hi hr jagah chapo
â€ŒAur kbhi corporate me tak-ta-taktak ungli chla ke bore ho jao...to apna wo evergreen gaana sun lena.... full-on energize ho jaoge
â€ŒAll the Best for future brother
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
"16 ka hai b_k_l_ "
â€Œthat was probably the first reaction jab hum pehli bar 1st yr galaxy me interact kre the
â€ŒUn badnaseeb raato me tumhari advices hi to interest bna ke rakhti thi
â€Œ(esc me fakke ka dar last tk bna ke rkha th bhai ne) 
â€ŒUske bad to phir tumne lgatar apne chaapuness se jhande gadna shuru kr diya th
â€ŒBs ab aage bhi chapte rho aur youngest UPSC topper bnke B-bot ka nam roshan kro
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Aur bhai Himanshu
â€Œ(atleast ek bar to ye nam bhi use kr lena chahiye) 
â€ŒFirst year ka summer or winter sath me bahut hi fun rha yar...especially winter me sham ko old-sac me mst badminton khelna or phir hall4 me bhel or chai
â€ŒU are a very multifaceted personality I must say...from the super-loud 1st year jo har bday me volume1 zrur bja ke nachta th...to the sophisticated spo saviour jise hr koi apni dikkat suna skta tha 
â€ŒBs aage bhi u hi 'khushi' se bharpur rho or khub paisa kamake apne dosto ko bdhiya party-sharty do
â€ŒAll the best for future brother
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Yo Ramya Jetti
â€Œ'dirty hands' ke us anokhe play me kafi shi experience rha hamara.. after all uski har pal badalti cast me hum kuch log hi to constant the
â€ŒUs play ka safar thoda similar hi th apna...kafi khrab se decent level acting tk to aa gye the...halaki phir tumne ek aur antaragni play krke decency se excellence tk pahucha liya khudko 
(I still vividly remember that last monologue of urs) 
â€ŒBich me ek english-play bhi kiya th jisme kuch seekha bhle na ho but fun to alg hi level pe tha...aur agle saal wale EP me jis level pe planning chl rhi thi ki agr hota tb to aag hi lga dete
â€ŒOne thing I wud especially appreciate u for is that tumne hmesha khud ko challenge krte rha...keep it up always
â€ŒBs ab aage bhi har field ke challenges ko u hi face krna... u will sail through them all with success
â€ŒAll the best for future
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Yo Keshav
â€ŒI was really blessed to have you as my 1st year roomie....TA ki ek bhi lab pass nhi ho pati wrna :P
â€ŒBut genuinely...kisi cheez ko leke dedicated hone ka inspiration mujhe tumse hi mila tha
â€Œl also always remember our numerous mini-militia matches in NCC uniform with the feels
â€ŒAll the best for future bro...I know you are destined for greatness ahead
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Some roommates are a perfect-match, some others are not... 
But we were a match made in heaven (of laziness) 
â€ŒMtlb raat bhar pyasa reh lenge pr bottle kaun bhre (#alasya_parmo_dharmah) 
â€ŒBut yar... the rollercoaster-ride of college life was ten times more fun with a companion like you
â€ŒAb finally B-117 ke comfort-zone se niklke life ko face krne ka waqt aa gya... 
â€ŒAll the best for Future brother
â€ŒAnd whatever the world has to offer, always remember the golden words.... 
â€ŒRelax... Stay Calm...Enjoy your life
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Loki was known as the  tricksterÂ godÂ andÂ deityÂ of mayhem andÂ mischiefÂ in Norse mythology.... 
But apna bhai to us ka bhi baap hai
â€Œ(Wo free coaching wala prank to mai kbhi nhi bhulega) 
â€ŒWith a sharp mind and even sharper words...his convincing skills has often washed away several people's convictions
â€Œ(Halaki aise maukaye-vardaat pr aksar ek dusra shaqs (haa rochak hi) credit le ja chuka h) 
â€ŒBut yar... Discussions ka jo fun tumhare sath tha wo kahi nhi (already missing them) 
â€ŒAll the Best for future brother
â€ŒMaybe abhi aage ka path thoda dark lage.. 
â€ŒBut you will shine with your own light
â€ŒYou are a star that'll make the world bright
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
My All_in_one_Partner_in_crime
â€ŒFrom Club to Classroom to TA ki lab, 
â€ŒFrom MT ki chai to Canteen ka kabab-paratha
â€ŒHar manzar ke saathi the apan bhai
â€ŒAnd you were the most reliable support everywhere 
â€Œ(Kal exam hai to Ostwal pdha dega,
Kal performance hai to Ostwal polish krwa dega...) 
â€ŒFrom Anand Trisal to Ramdas Kapoor.... har din khud ko improve krke perfection ki or badhte rehne ka talent bahut rare hota h dost
â€ŒBs aise hi aage badhte rho.... ek din bdhiya prof bnoge
â€ŒAbhi to mast corporate me paisa chapo....jeevan se BT dur rkho... aur aas pas walo ko 'Bhannaat' bnate rho
â€Œ(P.S. - agli bar kbhi 'Dont tell me sky is the limit...' wala quote use kro to credit de dena)
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Ek ladka tha deewana sa.. 
â€ŒDance krne ko wo marta tha
â€ŒActing bhi aati thi usko.. 
â€ŒMagar practise se katarta tha
â€ŒPr jab bhi stage pe utarta tha.. logo ke dil or trophy dono jeet kr ata th
â€ŒOur one and only multitalented multitasking multifaceted Nana
â€ŒAb tumhari tareef kya hi kare mitra
â€ŒLog apne batch me famous nhi ho pate ... tumne to upar aur neeche ke 4-6 batches me nam kamaya hai
â€ŒBs aise hi dil jeette rho...time to time aasman ki sair bhi krte rho
â€Œaur koi bhi kuch kahe to bta dena ki tum fraud nhi marte.. tum bs 'proactive' nhi ho
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Ab BRO ki tareef me shabd laye to laye kaha se... 
â€ŒMtlb sharafat ki ganga to B-115 se hi behti rahi hai 2 saal... 
â€ŒAap hi ke room ne jeevan ke vibhinn anubhavo se parichay kraya tha hamara.. 
â€ŒAur ab jeevan badalne wale anubhav me bhi aap hi hamare humraahi hai
â€ŒTo jab bhi Delhi jana...Sath lekr jana
â€ŒAur jb sath rhega BRO apna...To hai har mushkil ko kat jana
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Yo Shashi bro
â€ŒU are a very knowledgeable person I must say...tumhari gk ne hi sos ke us event me laaj bchai thi apni
â€Œ(afsos uska kuch mila nhi phir bad me) 
â€ŒRandom topics pe kbhi bhi tumse discussion krne me alg hi mza tha yar...or jab sath me sham ko campus-trip pe niklte the tb to next level feel ata tha (didn't realized one of those was our last one as students) 
â€ŒBaki apni aage ki manzil to same hi hai...to kbhi n kbhi mulakaat ho hi jayegi
â€ŒTill then...all the best for everything u do brother
â€Œ
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
To our one & only data-gawd Mahbus
â€ŒJab bhagwan tumhari programming kr rhe the to confuse ho gye ki Laziness zyada rkhe ya Chapuness....phir dono hi kuch zyada kr di
â€ŒA complete movie/ tv series/ anime guide....tum koi bhi nam lo bhai turant apna data process krke judgemental tarike se claim kr dete ki achchi lgegi ya nhi (usually quite correct btw) 
â€ŒSouth-indian movie se leke AoT ke manga tak ke sathi hai apn to.. aage bhi shows or movies suggest/discuss krne ka sath bnaye rakhna 
â€ŒBaki ab to mast paisa chapne ka tym hai tumhara... khub kamao aur jab bhi agli bar mile to bdhiya wali party-sharty do 
All the best till then bro
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Yo Snehal
â€ŒI was really fascinated meeting u in 1st year... (Cool + Studious) ke examples zyada dekhe nhi the n pehle
â€ŒIt was a very fun ride then...I especially remember jab apan dono or suprateek kisi bhi random topic pe discussion krne baith jate the... aur arguments khtm ho jane pr wo 'defence-mechanism' bolne lgta th
â€ŒYou are also among the rare persons who are quite aware of what they want in life...and I know you'll achieve it
â€ŒAll the best for future bro
author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
The most unique friend anyone can have...
and the person with insights on almost every topic under the sun (#elite)

Will miss u always bro

author: Adesh  Shukla

text:
Mahol thanda sa lg rha hai...jaan dalni pdegi.... and varun be like 'hold my bottle of sting'
â€ŒTumhare fun nature ke bare me to sbne tareef kr hi di hai...isliye apan dusre talent ki bat krna chahenge... your chapu top-level multitasking
â€Œmtlb bhai ki adhi screen pe breaking bad khula hota...or adhi me assignment...or sath hi sath nukkad ka discussion bhi 
â€Œ(I still don't know how that's humanely possible) 
â€ŒMza to bahut aya th yar us summer...mime-madhu ke pas se tuti-phuti haalat me aake rr ka ac bahut hi suhana lgta th (bhale hi 2 din me kat gye ho apn) 
â€ŒKam ko mazedar bnake maze maze me sb kam niptane ki adbhut pratibha ke kafi dhani ho mitra
â€ŒBs aise hi aage bhi apni pratibhao se har field me jhande gadte rehna...aur apne aap ko or aaspaas walo ko BT se dur rkhna
